original_text: Now these are the generations of the sons of Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth: and unto them were sons born after the flood.
korean_text: 노아의 아들 셈과 함과 야벳의 족보는 이러하니라 홍수 후에 그들이 아들들을 낳았으니

sentences.original_text: Now these are the generations of the sons of Noah
and unto them were sons born
